author: AB Newswire
title: Leah Wise Law Firm Earns 2024 Stellar Business Award for Best 100% Female-Run Law Firm in South Texas | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
McAllen, Texas - Leah Wise, Esq., founder and owner of Leah Wise Law Firm, PLLC , has been recognized as a leader in the legal industry, earning the esteemed 2024 Stellar Business Award for Best 100% Female-Run Law Firm in South Texas . With a commitment to excellence and a track record of delivering exceptional legal services, Leah Wise and her team stand out as a premier choice for individuals seeking representation in personal injury matters.
Specializing in personal injury law, Leah Wise Law Firm has garnered the trust of numerous clients who have benefitted from Wise's expertise and dedication. Handling a wide range of cases, including truck, car, motorcycle, oilfield, and construction accidents, as well as premises and product liability, Wise and her team have secured millions of dollars in compensation for injured individuals and their families. Her firm also handles cases related to dog bites, catastrophic injuries, work-related injuries, and wrongful death.
“I am thrilled and deeply honored to receive the 2024 Stellar Business Award for Best 100% Female-Run Law Firm in South Texas. This award reaffirms our commitment to providing exceptional legal services while championing diversity and female leadership in the legal profession,” shared Wise.
The selection committee for the Stellar Business Awards evaluated numerous outstanding providers before unanimously choosing Leah Wise Law Firm as the official winner. Criteria for selection included exceptional customer service, superb results, ethical practices, and a commitment to diversity and equity.
"As the top 100% Female-Run Law Firm in South Texas, Leah Wise and her team exemplify excellence in the legal profession," remarked a spokesperson for the Stellar Business Awards.
In recognition of their achievement, Leah Wise Law Firm, PLLC, has received a series of accolades, including a public announcement on the Stellar Business Awards website, social media recognition on platforms such as LinkedIn, Instagram, and Facebook, a physical certificate signed by the selection committee, and a trophy symbolizing their excellence in the field of law.
For individuals seeking unparalleled legal representation in South Texas, Leah Wise Law Firm offers a diverse and experienced team committed to achieving justice for their clients. To learn more about Leah Wise Law Firm and their services, visit their website at https://www.956abogada.com/ .
About Leah Wise:
Leah Wise is a trailblazing entrepreneur and attorney, dedicated to empowering Latinas and advocating for women's rights. She is the founder and owner of Leah Wise Law Firm, PLLC, the first Latina-owned law firm in South Texas specializing in personal injury cases. With a proven track record of securing millions of dollars in settlements for her clients, Leah has been recognized as one of the best lawyers in the nation for her remarkable achievements. She is also the proud owner of Leah Wise Enterprises, LLC, a real estate investment company, and CrashGal Couture, LLC, a clothing line. In addition, Leah is actively involved in community initiatives, including the co-founding of "Latina Feature Friday" to promote Latina-owned businesses, running mentorship programs for aspiring Latina lawyers and entrepreneurs. Her dedication to education and empowerment led her to establish the Leah Wise Latina Student Hardship Fund, pledging $50,000 to support Latina law students facing financial challenges at St. Mary's University School of Law. Leah's commitment to women's empowerment extends beyond her professional endeavors, as she passionately advocates for gender equality nationwide.

author: Giandomenico Tiseo
title: ATP Washington, Tiafoe raggiunge Cobolli negli ottavi. Arnaldi sfiderà Fritz, avanza Medvedev e Rublev ko
text:
Tennis
ATP Washington, Tiafoe raggiunge Cobolli negli ottavi. Arnaldi sfiderà Fritz, avanza Medvedev e Rublev ko
Definito il quadro dei qualificati agli ottavi di finale dell’ATP500 di Washington. Sul cemento americano saranno Flavio Cobolli e Matteo Arnaldi a tenere alto il vessillo italico. Il tennista romano si è imposto contro il giapponese Yoshihito Nishioka (n.89 del ranking) sullo score di 6-2 7-6 (3), mentre il ligure (n.44 del mondo) ha prevalso nel derby tricolore contro Lorenzo Sonego (n.37 ATP) sul punteggio di 7-5 7-5.
Ci saranno due americani sul cammino dei due azzurri. Cobolli se la vedrà contro Frances Tiafoe, mentre Arnaldi sarà opposto a Taylor Fritz. Due sfide, oggettivamente, molto complicate. Tiafoe (n.11 del mondo) ha sconfitto il connazionale Aleksandar Kovacevic (n.66 del ranking) col punteggio di 7-5 3-6 6-3, mentre il californiano (n.4 del ranking) ha piegato in due set l’australiano Aleksandar Vukic (n.105 del mondo) per 6-3 6-2.
E' online il n.3 della Rivista Azzurra! Le interviste a Tiberi e Oliha, le rubriche olimpiche, 'Saranno Campioni' e tanto altro! Scopri il sommario
Vittoria sofferta per Daniil Medvedev (n.14 del ranking) contro lo statunitense Reilly Opelka (n.74 ATP). Il moscovita è stato costretto a rimontare, venendo fuori alla distanza, sullo score di 3-6 7-5 6-1. Negli ottavi ci sarà l’incrocio contro il cinese Wu Yibing (n.243 del ranking), a segno a sorpresa contro l’australiano Alexei Popyrin (n.24 del mondo) per 7-5 5-7 6-3.
Uscita di scena, invece, per l’altro russo Andrey Rublev. Il n.10 del mondo è stato battuto dall’americano Learner Tien (n.67 del ranking) col punteggio di 7-5 6-2. Una vittoria significativa per il mancino statunitense che giocherà negli ottavi contro lo spagnolo Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (n.26 ATP), a segno contro il connazionale Jaume Munar (n.50 del mondo) per 6-4 6-2.
Prosegue il cammino dell’australiano Alex de Minaur (n.13 del ranking), vittorioso contro il cinese Bu Yunchaokete (n.75 ATP) con lo score di 7-6 (2) 6-2. Negli ottavi l’aussie sfiderà il ceco Jiri Lehecka (n.25 del mondo), impostosi a fatica contro il padrone di casa, Zachary Svajda (n.153 ATP), per 6-4 6-7 (5) 6-3.

author: Patricia Páramo
title: Peñón de Ifach, impresionantes vistas - Levante-EMV
text: Peñón de Ifach, impresionantes vistas Este sendero moderado discurre junto al mar y tiene de todo para los amantes de la naturaleza y el deporte: una parte fácil, otra más difícil, un túnel, así como atraviesa una rica flora y fauna mediterráneas. Patricia Páramo Las rutas de senderismo junto a mar suman al atractivo de la naturaleza y el deporte unas vistas impresionantes. Uno de los senderos más espectaculares de este tipo se encuentra en el Parque Natural del Peñón de Ifach en Calp. Esta ruta no solo es famosa por sus impresionantes panorámicas del Mediterráneo, sino también por su rica biodiversidad y la oportunidad de explorar un entorno natural único. Además, tiene de todo lo que aprecian los aficionados al senderismo. El Peñón de Ifach es un enorme peñasco de roca caliza que se eleva 332 metros sobre el mar Mediterráneo. Es uno de los símbolos más icónicos de toda la Costa Blanca y ha sido declarado parque natural para proteger su rica flora y fauna, así como su importancia geológica y cultural. Ruta por el Peñón de Ifach La ruta de senderismo del Peñón de Ifach tiene una longitud total de aproximadamente 5 kilómetros ida y vuelta. Comienza en el centro de visitantes del parque, recorre el peñón y llega hasta la cumbre. Duración del recorrido La duración total del recorrido puede variar dependiendo del ritmo de cada persona y las paradas que se realicen para disfrutar de las vistas y tomar fotografías. Generalmente, se estima que completar la ruta puede tomar entre 2 y 3 horas. Es importante considerar que la segunda mitad del recorrido es más empinada y rocosa, lo que puede requerir más tiempo y esfuerzo, especialmente si no se está acostumbrado a terrenos de este tipo. Dificultad de la ruta La ruta se clasifica de moderada a difícil. El principio del sendero es relativamente fácil y accesible, pero conforme se avanza, el camino se vuelve más empinado y desafiante, con algunas secciones que requieren trepar o usar las manos para estabilizarse, especialmente en la parte final que conduce a la cima. Esta segunda parte del camino solo es recomendable para senderistas expertos y en buena forma física. Características del sendero El sendero comienza en el centro de visitantes del parque, donde puedes aprender sobre la flora, fauna y geología del área. La primera parte del sendero es relativamente fácil y atraviesa una rica vegetación mediterránea. Es una subida moderada que cualquier persona con un estado físico razonable puede hacer. A medida que te acercas a la cima, el camino se vuelve más empinado y rocoso. Es recomendable llevar calzado adecuado para senderismo, ya que algunas partes pueden ser resbaladizas y requieren de cierta habilidad para escalar. Una vez en la cima, llega la gran recompensa: unas vistas inigualables de la costa de Alicante, el vasto mar Mediterráneo y en días claros, incluso podrás ver la isla de Ibiza en la lejanía. Recomendaciones para la ruta Es esencial llevar buen calzado de senderismo, agua suficiente, protección solar y sombrero. En cuanto a la seguridad y debido a las características del terreno, es recomendable hacer la ruta en buen estado físico y con cuidado, especialmente en la cima y las zonas más empinadas. Además, también debes evitar los meses más calurosos del verano, especialmente al mediodía. La primavera y el otoño son ideales debido al clima más templado, así que aprovecha ahora para hacer esta ruta de senderismo y disfrutar de sus inmejorables vistas al mar. [RRSS WhatsApp](https://api.whatsapp.com/send?text=Pe%C3%B1%C3%B3n%20de%20Ifach%2C%20impresionantes%20vistas%20https://www.levante-emv.com/urban/2024/07/19/penon-ifach-impresionantes-vistas-105808744.html%3Futm_source%3Dwhatsapp%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share) [RRSS Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www.levante-emv.com/urban/2024/07/19/penon-ifach-impresionantes-vistas-105808744.html%3Futm_source%3Dfacebook%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share) [RRSS Twitter](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?original_referer=https://www.levante-emv.com/urban/2024/07/19/penon-ifach-impresionantes-vistas-105808744.html&text=Pe%C3%B1%C3%B3n%20de%20Ifach%2C%20impresionantes%20vistas%20%20https://www.levante-emv.com/urban/2024/07/19/penon-ifach-impresionantes-vistas-105808744.html%3Futm_source%3Dtwitter%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share%20a%20trav%C3%A9s%20de%20%40levante_emv) [RRSS email](mailto:?subject=Pe%C3%B1%C3%B3n%20de%20Ifach%2C%20impresionantes%20vistas%20&body=https://www.levante-emv.com/urban/2024/07/19/penon-ifach-impresionantes-vistas-105808744.html%3Futm_source%3Dmail%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share) [Copiar URL](javascript: void(0)) [La Policía busca a un violador que atacó a una joven tumbada de noche en la playa del Cabanyal](https://www.levante-emv.com/sucesos/2024/07/26/violacion-en-valencia-policia-busca-violador-joven-sola-madrugada-playa-cabanyal-106085400.html) [Rescatan a ocho personas junto al Pantalán del Port de Sagunt](https://www.levante-emv.com/morvedre/2024/07/25/rescatan-ocho-personas-pantalan-port-rescate-socorristas-puerto-de-sagunto-salvamento-dron-emergencias-106073289.html) [Alejandra Rubio desvela el nombre de su bebé (que no va a gustar a su madre)](https://www.levante-emv.com/sociedad/2024/07/24/alejandra-rubio-desvela-nombre-bebe-madre-106036576.html) [La C. Valenciana es la única autonomía que nunca ha llegado a la media en financiación desde 2002](https://www.levante-emv.com/comunitat-valenciana/2024/07/26/c-valenciana-unica-autonomia-llegado-106059132.html) [Alessandro Lequio rompe su silencio y habla abiertamente del problema de salud que padece: 'Me acaban de llegar los resultados](https://www.levante-emv.com/sociedad/2024/07/24/alessandro-lequio-problemas-salud-enfermedad-106035558.html) [Habla la empresa que contrató a la médica 'borracha' en Castelló y estudia llevarla a juicio: 'Estamos muy avergonzados y es imperdonable](https://www.levante-emv.com/castello/2024/07/25/habla-empresa-contrato-medica-borracha-106064640.html) [Un 'ataque masivo' en los trenes lleva el caos a Francia antes de la inauguración](https://www.levante-emv.com/olimpiadas/2024/07/26/ataque-masivo-trenes-lleva-caos-106093350.html) [La presencia de enterococos en la playa de Canet obliga a prohibir el baño](https://www.levante-emv.com/morvedre/2024/07/25/canet-prohibe-bano-playa-bano-cierre-106071294.html)

author: VNExplorer
title: Cricketer whose political protests cost him his career warns Usman Khawaja that he is risking becoming the next Israel Folau
text:
Ex-Zimbabwe player also wore black armband as protest Lost his international cricket career as a result of messageWarms Khawaja could follow in the footsteps of sacked rugby star
Former Zimbabwean cricketer Henry Olonga, known for his black armband protest during the 2003 World Cup, has warned Australian star Usman Khawaja he could become the next Israel Folau if he keeps defying authorities to send political messages on the pitch.
In the lead-up to the first Test against Pakistan in Perth, Khawaja donned shoes bearing the slogans ‘freedom is a human right’ and ‘all lives are equal’ during training.
The messages were prominently displayed in red, green, and black, mirroring the colors of the Palestinian flag.
When the ICC banned him from displaying the words during the Test match, he choose to wear a black armband to show his support instead and has been charged by cricket’s governing body as a result.
Olonga, who experienced the ramifications of taking a political stance on the cricket field firsthand, expressed his support for Khawaja’s right to express his views but stressed the potential risks involved.
Australian opener Usman Khawaja wore a black armband in support of Palestinians during the first Test against Pakistan in Perth
Khawaja initially wore shoes with the messages ‘freedom is a human right’ and ‘all lives are equal’ before the ICC stepped in to ban them – and he put tape over those words (pictured)
A banner featuring the messages ‘freedom is a human right’ and ‘all lives are equal’ was unfurled during the Perth Test before security confiscated it
Olonga’s own career took a significant hit after he and teammate Andrew Flower donned black armbands during the 2003 World Cup to mourn ‘the death of democracy’ under Zimbabwe’s then-president, dictator Robert Mugabe.
Observing Khawaja’s recent black armband gesture during the first Test against Pakistan in Perth, Olonga endorsed the cricketer’s Instagram post, which highlighted Khawaja’s distress over the human toll in the Israel-Palestine conflict.
Despite Khawaja’s intent to promote a humanitarian ‘all lives are equal’ stance, the ICC had not granted permission for the armband.
Now facing potential consequences, Khawaja’s actions have brought the ICC’s position into question, with Olonga arguing that the governing body’s handling of the situation reveals a double standard.
‘The same people saying politics and sport don’t mix are the same people parading [Australian Prime Minister] Anthony Albanese and (Indian Prime Minister) Narendra Modi in a chariot at the cricket in India and giving them a platform at a sporting event to show solidarity,’ Olonga told News Corp.
‘So when it is convenient for the ICC they are happy to parade politicians so it’s hard with clean hands for them to come down on Uzzy. It’s weird that they pick and choose their political causes.’
Israel Folau was sacked by Rugby Australia for homophobic comments made online that he defended as part of his religious stance
Folau (pictured with his wife Maria) settled with Rugby Australia out of court for a reported $4million
Olonga said that Usman would also have to pick and choose his battles moving forward, or face cricket oblivion if the ICC and Cricket Australia think he has taken his messages of support too far.
He compared Khawaja to former Wallaby Israel Folau.
In 2019, Folau faced contract termination from the Wallabies due to homophobic social media posts, leading to a contentious legal battle with Rugby Australia.
The dispute, rooted in allegations of unfair dismissal based on religious beliefs, was eventually settled out of court for a reported $4million, after Folau initially sought $14 million in compensation.
‘My concern is that if Uzzy digs his heels in he may well find himself on the wrong side of everything. The question is, when should he back off? Has he made his point? Should he back off now? Does he keep going?’ Olonga asked.
‘In the case of [rugby union’s] Israel Folau [who took a religion-based stance against homosexuality] he kept going and lost his career.
‘I kept going and I lost my career. History will suggest if Uzzy keeps going this could end his career. I hope it doesn’t. I hope Australia is a much more tolerant country.
Henry Olonga knows what it is like to lose a cricket career over a political protest
The former Zimbabwe international (pictured bowling) wore a black armband at the 2003 Cricket World Cup and consequently lost his place in the team
Olonga conceded the situation was complex and expects the ICC to pass the buck to Cricket Australia to take action.
‘I think it is very hard for them to condemn Uzzy for standing up for human rights irrespective of which side of the argument you are on,’ he said.
‘In my own view I probably don’t lean to support Palestine but I would not begrudge some who does from the opportunity to speak on behalf of the Palestinian people.
‘I think the ICC may well pass the buck (to Cricket Australia) and they would do well to do that otherwise they would be so hypercritical.
‘It is a complicated one. If you surveyed 1000 people on this it would be very hard to find a consensus on the issues but he is actually tapping in on something which is universal which is shouldn’t we treat each other with dignity and respect.’

author: , Green Bay Press-Gazette
title: Hamas says it accepts cease-fire proposal from Egypt, Qatar
text: Jordan King Abdullah II warned that an Israeli assault on Rafah, where more than 1 million Palestinians have taken refuge, threatens to lead to a new massacre, according to a statement posted on social media by the Royal Hashemite Court. Abdullah met on Monday with President Joe Biden, where the two leaders affirmed their commitment to working to reach a sustainable ceasefire in Gaza, the royal court said. Jordan is a key U.S. ally in the region. Last month, the Jordanian air force shot down dozens of Iranian drones headed for Israel as Tehran launched a massive revenge attack on its arch-enemy. The White House wasn t as publicly explicit in its concerns over the potential civilian toll of a Rafah operation. Earlier this year, Biden said it would be catastrophic. On Monday the White House would only say: The President reiterated his clear position on Rafah during a phone call with Netanyahu. “Israel s order for around 100,000 Palestinians in Gaza to evacuate ahead of an offensive in Rafah puts every single Palestinian in Gaza in grave danger, the humanitarian group Oxfam said in a statement −Dan Morrison

author: Agencia Bloomberg
title: Gobernador de Texas promete más alambre de púas en frontera México-EE.UU.
text: El gobernador de Texas, el republicano Greg Abbott, ha desafiado al [Tribunal Supremo de Estados Unidos](https://gestion.pe/mundo/eeuu/corte-suprema-de-eeuu-permite-cortar-alambre-de-puas-en-frontera-con-mexico-noticia/) al ordenar que la Guardia Nacional texana mantenga el alambre de púas que colocó en la frontera con México para disuadir la entrada de migrantes. “Texas tiene el derecho constitucional a defenderse”, argumentó este jueves en una entrevista con Fox News, en la que acusó al presidente de Estados Unidos, el demócrata [Joe Biden](https://gestion.pe/mundo/guerras-de-gaza-y-de-ucrania-entorpecen-el-camino-a-la-reeleccion-de-biden-elecciones-en-eeuu-joe-biden-donald-trump-noticia/), de haber “abdicado su responsabilidad” de proteger la frontera. Por ello, el republicano defendió la instalación de más “barreras” que impidan la entrada a los migrantes, a los que considera unos “delincuentes”. El pasado lunes, el Supremo dio la razón al Gobierno federal para que pueda retirar el alambre de púas que las autoridades texanas colocaron en un tramo de la frontera en Eagle Pass para frenar a los migrantes. La Administración de Biden alega que la barrera de espino impide a los agentes de la Patrulla Fronteriza federal acceder al área y desempeñar sus funciones. En respuesta a la decisión del alto tribunal, Abbott declaró el miércoles la existencia de una “invasión” en Texas, lo que a su juicio otorga a su Gobierno “la autoridad constitucional de defender” al estado. LEA TAMBIÉN: [Guerras de Gaza y de Ucrania entorpecen el camino a la reelección de Biden] En un comunicado, el gobernador aseguró que la Guardia Nacional texana y la Policía estatal actuarán “bajo esta autoridad” para “proteger la frontera de Texas” y, según medios locales, siguen los trabajos de instalación de más alambre de púas. La Guardia Nacional texana patrulla desde hace tiempo la frontera, lo que ha provocado roces con las autoridades federales. El pasado 12 de enero se vivió un punto máximo de tensión cuando agentes federales acusaron a las autoridades texanas de haberles impedido el acceso al área para rescatar a una familia de tres migrantes que se ahogó en el río Bravo. Además de la colocación del alambre de púas y el despliegue de la Guardia Nacional, Abbott ha enviado decenas de buses con migrantes a Washington y a varias otras ciudades gobernadas por demócratas como parte de su enfrentamiento con las políticas de Biden. También instaló una polémica barrera de boyas en un tramo del río Bravo e impulsó una ley para criminalizar a los migrantes que cruzan de forma irregular la frontera, ambas medidas muy criticadas por el presidente de México, [Andrés Manuel López Obrador](https://gestion.pe/mundo/mexico/lopez-obrador-busca-desaparecer-todos-los-organismos-autonomos-en-su-paquete-de-reformas-noticia/). LEA TAMBIÉN: [Corte Suprema de EE.UU. permite cortar alambre de púas en frontera con México] Comienza a destacar en el mundo empresarial recibiendo las noticias más exclusivas del día en tu bandeja [Aquí]. Si aún no tienes una cuenta, [Regístrate gratis]y sé parte de nuestra comunidad.

author: MarketScreener
title: Yulia Navalnaya demands authorities release husband's body, calls Putin's faith 'fake' -February 24, 2024 at 03:09 am | MarketScreener
text:
(Reuters) - Yulia Navalnaya, the widow of the late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, on Saturday demanded that Russian authorities release his body for burial and accused a "demonic" Russian President Vladimir Putin of "torturing" his corpse.
In a six minute video posted on YouTube, Navalnaya accused Putin of holding her husband's body "hostage", and questioned Putin's often-professed Christian faith.
Navalny's mother Lyudmila said on Friday that Russian investigators were refusing to release his body from a morgue in the remote Arctic city of Salekhard until she agreed to lay him to rest without a public funeral.
She said an official had told her that she should agree to their demands, as Navalny's body was already decomposing.
On Saturday, Navalny aides said that authorities had threatened to bury him in the remote prison colony where he died unless his family agreed to their conditions.
In the video, an emotional Yulia Navalnaya claimed that Putin personally was responsible for the whereabouts of Navalny's body, and that he was "torturing" Navalny in death as he had in life.
"We already knew that Putin's faith was fake. But now we see it more clearly than ever before," said Navalnaya, dressed in black.
"No true Christian could ever do what Putin is now doing with Alexei's body."
Since returning to the Russian presidency in 2012, Vladimir Putin has positioned himself as a defender of traditional, conservative values against what he portrays as corrosive Western liberalism.
He has also trumpeted his closeness to Russia's Orthodox Church, regularly appearing at services around religious festivals, and speaking of his personal faith.
Navalnaya said her husband had been a devout Christian, who attended church and had fasted for Lent even while in prison. She said his political activism had been inspired by Christian values.
Concluding her video, she said: "Give us back the body of my husband. We want to hold a funeral service and bury him in a humane way, in the ground, as is customary in Orthodox Christianity."
(Reporting by Felix Light; Editing by Tomasz Janowski)
Share © Reuters - 2024

author: Gabriel Amaral Teixeira
title: Arsenal perde do West Ham e desperdiça chance de tirar Liverpool da liderança do Inglês - Gazeta Esportiva - Muito além dos 90 minutos
text: Arsenal perde do West Ham e desperdiça chance de tirar Liverpool da liderança do Inglês Por Redação 28/12/2023 às 19:13 • Atualizado: 28/12/2023 às 19:19 São Paulo, SP O O meia Lucas Paquetá, que também atua pela Seleção Brasileira, teve que ser substituído ainda no primeiro tempo por conta de dores na panturrilha esquerda. O jogador sentiu durante o aquecimento, mas ainda assim tentou jogar. Depois de 33 minutos em campo, precisou sair. Os Gunners foram ultrapassados pelo O West Ham subiu para a sexta posição, com 33 pontos, separado por três da zona de classificação para as competições europeias. A equipe volta a campo na terça-feira, para receber o Brighton no Estádio Olímpico de Londres, a partir das 16h30. O Arsenal dominou a posse de bola durante todo o primeiro tempo. Os donos da casa focaram seus ataques pelo lado direito, com Saka e Odegaard jogando próximos. Ainda assim, foi o West Ham quem abriu o placar. Aos 13 minutos, a defesa dos Gunners se atrapalhou na tentativa de cortar um cruzamento. O atacante Jarrod Bowen impediu a saída da bola pela linha de fundo e tocou para o meio. Tomás Soucek apareceu no meio da área para completar. O VAR chegou a revisar o lance para investigar uma possível saída da bola no momento da assistência, mas validou o gol. O West Ham ampliou a vantagem pouco depois do início do segundo tempo. Aos 10 minutos, Ward-Prowse cobrou um escanteio na medida para Konstantinos Mavropanos cabecear com firmeza. O zagueiro subiu mais alto que os marcadores e desviou para o canto superior direito, a bola chegou a tocar no travessão antes de entrar. Pouco antes do apito final, os visitantes marcaram mais uma vez. Declan Rice derrubou Emerson dentro da área e um pênalti foi marcado. Benrahma cobrou no canto direito e o goleiro David Raya caiu para defender. Logo na sequência, o árbitro assinalou o final da partida. O Brighton encerrou uma sequência de três jogos sem vencer nesta quinta-feira, com um triunfo contra o Agora com 30 pontos, o Brighton assumiu a oitava colocação. Seu próximo compromisso será contra o West Ham. O Tottenham seguiu no quinto lugar, com 36, e volta a campo para enfrentar o Bournemouth. [Arsenal](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/times/arsenal)foi derrotado pelo [West Ham](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/times/west-ham)nesta quinta-feira e, com isso, não conseguiu retomar a liderança do [Campeonato Inglês](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/campeonatos/premier-league). Pela 19ª rodada, no Emirates Stadium, os visitantes venceram por 2 a 0, com gols de Tomás Sucek e Konstantinos Mavropanos. O meia Lucas Paquetá, que também atua pela Seleção Brasileira, teve que ser substituído ainda no primeiro tempo por conta de dores na panturrilha esquerda. O jogador sentiu durante o aquecimento, mas ainda assim tentou jogar. Depois de 33 minutos em campo, precisou sair. Os Gunners foram ultrapassados pelo [Liverpool](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/times/liverpool), que venceu nesta rodada e alcançou 42 pontos. Com 40, o Arsenal terminou a rodada na segunda colocação. Seu próximo desafio será no domingo, às 11h (de Brasília), contra o Fulham, em Craven Cottage. O West Ham subiu para a sexta posição, com 33 pontos, separado por três da zona de classificação para as competições europeias. A equipe volta a campo na terça-feira, para receber o Brighton no Estádio Olímpico de Londres, a partir das 16h30. Defeat at Emirates Stadium. [pic.twitter.com/MlVUCWSjlR] — Arsenal (@Arsenal) [December 28, 2023] Os gols do jogo O Arsenal dominou a posse de bola durante todo o primeiro tempo. Os donos da casa focaram seus ataques pelo lado direito, com Saka e Odegaard jogando próximos. Ainda assim, foi o West Ham quem abriu o placar. Aos 13 minutos, a defesa dos Gunners se atrapalhou na tentativa de cortar um cruzamento. O atacante Jarrod Bowen impediu a saída da bola pela linha de fundo e tocou para o meio. Tomás Soucek apareceu no meio da área para completar. O VAR chegou a revisar o lance para investigar uma possível saída da bola no momento da assistência, mas validou o gol. O West Ham ampliou a vantagem pouco depois do início do segundo tempo. Aos 10 minutos, Ward-Prowse cobrou um escanteio na medida para Konstantinos Mavropanos cabecear com firmeza. O zagueiro subiu mais alto que os marcadores e desviou para o canto superior direito, a bola chegou a tocar no travessão antes de entrar. Pouco antes do apito final, os visitantes marcaram mais uma vez. Declan Rice derrubou Emerson dentro da área e um pênalti foi marcado. Benrahma cobrou no canto direito e o goleiro David Raya caiu para defender. Logo na sequência, o árbitro assinalou o final da partida. João Pedro marca dois, e Brighton vence Tottenham O Brighton encerrou uma sequência de três jogos sem vencer nesta quinta-feira, com um triunfo contra o [Tottenham](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/times/tottenham)por 4 a 2, no Falmer Stadium. O destaque da partida foi o atacante da Seleção Brasileira, João Pedro, que marcou dois gols de pênalti. Jack Hinshelwood e Pervis Estupinán completaram o placar para os mandantes, enquanto Alejo Véliz e Ben Davies descontaram para os visitantes. Agora com 30 pontos, o Brighton assumiu a oitava colocação. Seu próximo compromisso será contra o West Ham. O Tottenham seguiu no quinto lugar, com 36, e volta a campo para enfrentar o Bournemouth. — Brighton & Hove Albion (@OfficialBHAFC) [December 28, 2023]

author: 世铝网
title: 正信期货：板块情绪带动，铝偏强震荡_世铝网
text:
电解铝主力05合约周三增仓破位，开盘价 20930，收盘价21000，资金重回流入状态，受板块整体乐观情绪影响，沪铝日内表现偏强。沪铝最新社库87.4万吨，较上周四去库1万吨，延续去库，绝对值接近去年同期水平，处于历史同期相对低位。国内铝下游加工龙头企业开工率保持复苏态势，环比上周涨1.1个百分点至59.8%，三月旺季成色仍有待验证。现货铝锭报价20880-20920元/吨，成交均价较周二上涨190元/吨，达20900元/吨，现货贴水维持在-40元/吨不变。
综合来看，短期盘面整体受外围情绪影响较大，美元指数大幅回落，降息预期再起，加上板块情绪带动，盘面偏强运行。而对于沪铝品种来说，随着国内宏观会议落地，接下来盘面或回归基本面交易，检验“金三银四”旺季成色，就目前数据上来看，下游表现中规中矩，虽有复苏但幅度有限，且铝棒库存处于相对高位，电解铝整体呈现供需双弱的紧平衡特征，社库的相对低位对价格存有一定支撑，但驱动方面还需等待下游表现。因此，预计盘面维持高位震荡，主力05价格运行区间在20400-21200元/吨之间，关注盘面在21200附近的压力情况，建议持续关注下游复苏进度及社库变化情况。
(责任编辑：盈盈)
此信息仅供参考，据此入市，风险自担！
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance
Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news

author: Zach Martin / zach@chronline.com
title: Sprinters carry W.F. West girls to double digit wins | The Daily Chronicle
text: Ignited by sweeping the three relays and claiming two handfuls of individual wins, W.F. West dominated the girls side of a five-team league meet last week in Shelton with 11 total victories, more than the rest of the field. Lauren Kelley was the star for the Bearcats, securing the open 200 in 28.1 seconds, just clipping Adna’s Megan Price. Kelley anchored the victorious 400 and 800 relays and kicked off the 1,600 relay that capped the night with a 13-second win. Julia Dalan, Amanda Bennett and Trinity Gist teamed with Kelley on the two faster relays while Ashlen Gruginski, Emily Mallonee and Joy Cushman completed the foursome on the last relay of the meet. Nearly all of them had an individual event win. Dalan secured the open 100 in 14.4 seconds, Bennett continued her stellar start in the javelin with a winning heave of 108 feet, 10 inches while Cushman (400), Gruginski (800) and Mallonee (300 hurdles) crossed the finish line first. Berkeley Varick (3,200) and Mercedes Ricks (pole vault) also had wins for the Bearcats. Dalan snared second in the javelin. Adna picked up wins in two of the throwing events as Lillian Boyd won the shot put with a toss of 33-08 and Karsyn Freeman threw the discus over 109 feet to edge past Boyd. Black Hills’ high jump tandem of Lilly Kincaid and Lia Crecelius each cleared 4-4 in the high jump, tying or first. On the boys side, W.F. West’s Hayden Niemi and Lucas Hoff each won two events. Niemi darted 44.9 seconds to win the 300 hurdles and unleashed a throw of 135-01 to claim the javelin, plus he finished second in the 110 hurdles. Hoff won the high jump and pole vault, clearing the bars at 5-10 and 12-06, respectively. Trenton Schoepf leaped 35-06 to claim the triple jump while the Bearcats’ 400 relay dashed around the track in 46.3 seconds. Adna’s Jordan Stout coasted in the 3,200 while Tyler Price placed runner-up in the open 100 and 200. Cohen Hartley (400), Bailey Davis (1600) and Gavan Muller (300 hurdles) also were in second for the Pirates. Black Hills’ Ezra Harris was the runner-up in the javelin.
